profile.profileDescription: Custom system developed for the Bacardi Archive

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Repository
label.description: This element identifies the name and location of the repository that hold the materials being described.

label.name: Date(s)
label.description: Dates when records accumulated, dates when created etc.

label.name: Extent of the unit
label.description: Record the extent of the unit of description by giving the number of physical or logical units in arabic numerals and the unit of measurement.

label.name: Administrative/Biographical History
label.description: Admin history or biographical details of the creator(s) of the unit of description, include significant information about origin, progress, development, work etc. For persons and families include: full names and titles, dates of birth and death, place of birth, places of domicile, activities, occupation or offices, names, significant accomplishments, place of death. For corporate bodies include: official name, date of existence, enabling legislation, functions, purpose and development, admin hierarchy, earlier or variant names.

label.name: Archival History
label.description: Include history of the unit of description which is significant for its authenticity, integrity and interpretation. Include: successive transfers of ownership, responsibility or custody, history of arrangement, finding aids, re-use for software migrations that have contributed to its present arrangement. Dates of these actions. If the records are acquired directly from the creator, this information may appear in the immediate source of acquisition.

label.name: Immediate Sources of Acquisition or Transfer
label.description: Record the source of the unit of description, and date / method of acquisition. If source not known, record that. Include accession numbers and codes.

label.name: Scope and Content
label.description: Summary of scope (time periods, geography) and content (documentary forms, subject matter, admin process) of the unit of description.

label.name: Appraisal, Destruction and Scheduling Information
label.description: Appraisal, destruction, scheduling actions taken or planned especially if they affect interpretation of the material.

label.name: Accruals
label.description: To inform the user of foreseen additions to the unit of description.

label.name: System of Arrangement
label.description: The internal structure, order, or system of classification of the unit of description. For electronic records record or reference information on system design.

label.name: Conditions Governing Access
label.description: Legal status or other regulations affecting access. Specify law or legal status, contract, regulation or policy. Indicate extent of period of closure and date when open.

label.name: Conditions Governing Reproduction
label.description: Restrictions on reproduction, including copyright.

label.name: Languages and Scripts of Material
label.description: Language(s), script(s), distinctive alphabets, symbol systems or abbreviations.

label.name: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
label.description: Physical characteristics or technical requirements that affect the unit of description. Include preservation requirements that affect use or software / hardware.

label.name: Finding Aids
label.description: Info about finding aids that may provide information relating to the context and contents of the unit of description.

label.name: Existence and Location of Originals
label.description: Indicate availability or destruction of originals if the unit of description is a copy. Include location, significant control numbers.

label.name: Existence and Location of Copies
label.description: Record location and any significant control numbers.

label.name: Related Units of Description
label.description: In same repository or elsewhere that are related by provenance or other associations. Explain nature of relationship.

label.name: Publication Note (Bibliography)
label.description: To identify publications that are based on the use, study or analysis of the unit of description. Record a citation and / or publication info..

label.name: Notes
label.description: Information that cannot be accommodated in any of the other areas.

label.name: Archivist Note
label.description: Explain how the description was prepared and by whom. Include notes on sources consulted.

label.name: Rules or Conventions
label.description: Protocols on which the description is based, including international, national or local rules or conventions followed in preparing the description.

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of Object

label.name: Product Name
label.description: Product title

label.name: Front Label(s)
label.description: Description of all front label(s) including neck, foot, shoulder etc.

label.name: Back Label(s)
label.description: Description of all back label(s)

label.name: Secondary Pack
label.description: Description of secondary pack if present (cartons, boxes etc)

label.name: Additional Description
label.description: Any additional, unusual packaging description including neck tags, wraps etc.

label.name: Valuation
label.description: Any known value of the item

label.name: Valuation Date
label.description: Date when valuation was created

label.name: Bottle Physical Characteristics
label.description: Bottles shape, glass / plastic / ceramic colour, embossing, etching or other marks in the glass, whether full or fill level

label.name: Closure
label.description: Whether a cork, cap, capsule etc are used and whether it is still sealed, and any other relevant description details.

label.name: Capacity
label.description: General text field to allow for numbers and characters as the method of expression changes over time

label.name: Alcohol Content
label.description: General text field to record abv or other forms of alcohol content

label.name: Date accessioned
label.description: Date when brought into collection

settings.setting: If digital image available and any relevant information
Title of the unit of description, abridged if necessary
Creator of the unit of description, i.e. the organisation or individual responsible
If digital image available and any relevant information
If digital image available and any relevant information

Title of the unit of description, abridged if necessary
Location reference including room reference, shelf reference etc.
Title of the unit of description, abridged if necessary
Location reference including room reference, shelf reference etc.
Creator of the unit of description, i.e. the organisation or individual responsible
